snippet: George Zimmerman was ordered to surrender to authorities after a prosecutor accused him of lying about his finances at a bail hearing.
abstract: Florida Judge Kenneth R Lester Jr revokes the bond of George Zimmerman, who has been charged with second-degree murder in the shooting of Trayvon Martin, after state prosecutors argued that Zimmerman had misled the court about his finances.
lead_paragraph: George Zimmerman was ordered to surrender to authorities after a prosecutor accused him of lying about his finances at a bail hearing.

headline.seo: Bond Revoked for Suspect in Martin Shooting
headline.main: Judge Tells Zimmerman He Must Go Back to Jail
headline.print_headline: Judge Tells Zimmerman He Must Go Back to Jail
